darkhistory¶

Table of Sub-Modules

main Module containing the main DarkHistory function.
config Module for configuring DarkHistory.
tf_data Module for loading DarkHistory data.
darkhistory.physics Physics functions as well as constants.
darkhistory.utilities Non-physics functions used in darkhistory.

Table of Packages

darkhistory.electrons Electron cooling processes.
darkhistory.history
darkhistory.low_energy
darkhistory.spec Classes and functions for manipulating spectra.
